The following box should break the sequence of symbols at the 5 character mark and not overflow the blue box. This is because U+1D49 is a number category unicode character, for which break-all applies.

𝒞𝒞𝒞𝒞𝒞𝒞𝒞𝒞𝒞𝒞

The following box should not break the sequence of symbols since U+1F1EF is not a letter or number category character.

🇯🇵🇯🇵🇯🇵🇯🇵🇯🇵🇯🇵🇯🇵🇯🇵
